item.description:
Another wonderful location for winter outdoor fun in the Seacoast Area is Maudsley State Park in Newburyport. Let's take advantage of this wonderful park while there is still plenty of the white stuff on the ground. Bring your Cross Country Skis, Snow Shoes or winter hiking boots and enjoy exploring the parks trails in the wintertime. For more information about Maudsley State Park see the link below. There are directions on the Maudsley State Park Web Site as well. There is a $2 admission cost to the park that you put into a drop box. Please bring cash for the admission fee. We'll meet at the big parking lot at the Park Entrance on Curzon Mill Rd.

Maudsley State Park Newburyport MA

More Info. on Maudsley frome Seacoast Online

After enjoying a couple of hours in the park we'll head to lunch somewhere in the Newburyport area for a late lunch and conversation.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the parking lot at the Park Entrance on Curzon Mill Rd.
item.name: Cross Country Skiing or Snow Shoeing at Maudsley State Park Newburyport MA
